original: @316a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @316a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bo dhi a'a ka ra pra ni dh'a na /
analyzed: bo dhi a'a ka ra pra ni dh'a na /
translated: Bodhi-ƒÅkara-pra·πáidhƒÅna

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam /
analyzed: byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam /
translated: The Aspiration of the Source of Enlightenment

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´!

original: log rtog mun bsal mkhyen rab 'dab rgyas shing //
analyzed: log rtog mun bsal mkhyen rab 'dab rgyas shing //
translated: You dispel the darkness of misconception, your wisdom blooms,

original: bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom yang dag ji bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom yang dag ji bzhin gshegs //
translated: You conquer the four mƒÅras, you are the true and perfect Buddha,

original: thugs rje'i mtsho bskyil don mchog 'byor ba'i gter //
analyzed: thugs rje'i mtsho bskyil don mchog 'byor ba'i gter //
translated: You are an ocean of compassion, a treasure of mastery in the supreme goal.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the blessed buddhas!

original: mkha' ltar mtshan med rab zhi rtog las 'das //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mtshan med rab zhi rtog las 'das //
translated: You are beyond thought, like the sky, free from characteristics, utterly peaceful,

original: sgrib pa'i skyon bral legs tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: sgrib pa'i skyon bral legs tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: Free from the faults of obscuration, the source of all that is excellent,

original: skye bo 'gro mang byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: skye bo 'gro mang byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: The source of enlightenment for many beings, for the multitudes of beings.

original: yang dag dam chos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yang dag dam chos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the true and sacred Dharma!

original: nyon mongs dgra rgyal srid mtsho las rgal cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs dgra rgyal srid mtsho las rgal cing //
translated: You are victorious over the enemy of afflictions, you have crossed the ocean of existence,

original: sdug bsngal mtshon spangs yang dag thar lam mkhyen //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mtshon spangs yang dag thar lam mkhyen //
translated: You have abandoned the weapons of suffering, you know the path of true liberation,

original: 'gro la phan mdzad yon tan mang po'i phul //
analyzed: 'gro la phan mdzad yon tan mang po'i phul //
translated: You benefit beings, you are the pinnacle of many qualities.

original: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the noble Sangha.

original: chos dbyings mkha' dkyil mkhyen rab nyi shar nas //
analyzed: chos dbyings mkha' dkyil mkhyen rab nyi shar nas //
translated: The sun of wisdom rises in the sky of the dharmadhatu,

original: rmongs pa'i mun bsal yang dag chos nyid rtogs //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i mun bsal yang dag chos nyid rtogs //
translated: Dispelling the darkness of ignorance and realizing the true nature of phenomena.

original: thabs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la phan brtson pa //
analyzed: thabs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la phan brtson pa //
translated: Endowed with skillful means, you strive to benefit beings with compassion,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩrin chen sa gzhi dpag bsam nags tshal bcas //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo // rin chen sa gzhi dpag bsam nags tshal bcas //
translated: I pay homage to the assembly of bodhisattvas.üîΩThe jeweled ground, the forest of wish-fulfilling trees,

original: yid bzhin gzhal yas gdan khri rgyan mchog ldan //
analyzed: yid bzhin gzhal yas gdan khri rgyan mchog ldan //
translated: The immeasurable palace of the sky, the supreme throne and ornaments,

original: lha mi'i mchod sprin mang po gtibs @316b pa rnams //
analyzed: lha mi'i mchod sprin mang po gtibs @316b pa rnams //
translated: The gathering of offering clouds of gods and humans‚Äî

original: yon tan gter mnga' sras bcas rgyal la 'bul //
analyzed: yon tan gter mnga' sras bcas rgyal la 'bul //
translated: I offer this to the Victorious Ones and their Bodhisattva heirs, who possess the treasure of qualities.

original: dus kun bdag gis dkon mchog gsum spangs shing //
analyzed: dus kun bdag gis dkon mchog gsum spangs shing //
translated: At all times, I have abandoned the Three JewelsüîΩAnd given up the mind of awakening, which surrounds them,

original: de yi bskor phyogs byang chub sems btang dang // mtshams med la sogs smad pa'i las byas rnams //
analyzed: de yi bskor phyogs byang chub sems btang dang // mtshams med la sogs smad pa'i las byas rnams //
translated: And have committed the worst of negative actions, such as the heinous crimes.

original: bla ma'i spyan sngar de bshags slan chad bsdams //
analyzed: bla ma'i spyan sngar de bshags slan chad bsdams //
translated: In the presence of my teacher, I confess these and vow to refrain from them in the future.

original: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo yi //
translated: Bodhisattvas, and ordinary beings,

original: bsod nams rgyu dang 'bras bcas ci mchis pa //
analyzed: bsod nams rgyu dang 'bras bcas ci mchis pa //
translated: Whatever it is,

original: de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in it all.üîΩIn whatever direction there are Sugatas

original: phyogs gang 'gro la sman slad bde gshegs rnams //
analyzed: phyogs gang 'gro la sman slad bde gshegs rnams //
translated: Who wish to enter nirvana,

original: mya ngan 'dar bzhed chos bshad bskul gzhes la //
analyzed: mya ngan 'dar bzhed chos bshad bskul gzhes la //
translated: I request them to turn the wheel of Dharma

original: 'gro ba'i don slad mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don slad mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
translated: For the sake of beings, and not to pass into nirvana.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul //
translated: I request the Three Jewels, the Buddha, the holy Dharma, and the Sangha,

original: skyon kun byang zhing yon tan kun rdzogs pa //üîΩsangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dkon mchog la //
analyzed: skyon kun byang zhing yon tan kun rdzogs pa // sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dkon mchog la //
translated: Who are free from all faults and endowed with all good qualities,

original: bdag ni dus kun lus 'bul skyabs gsol gyis //
analyzed: bdag ni dus kun lus 'bul skyabs gsol gyis //
translated: To accept me always, to protect me, and to be my refuge.

original: yongs bzhes log lta'i lam las bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: yongs bzhes log lta'i lam las bskyab tu gsol //
translated: Please save me from the path of wrong views.üîΩIn order to clear away the afflictions of beings

original: bdag gis 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bsal slad dang // byang chub spyad pa'i bcom ldan gdung bsab phyir //
analyzed: bdag gis 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bsal slad dang // byang chub spyad pa'i bcom ldan gdung bsab phyir //
translated: And to fulfill the wishes of the Bhagavans who engage in the conduct of enlightenment,

original: bdag med rtog bral mi gnas rtag pa yi //
analyzed: bdag med rtog bral mi gnas rtag pa yi //
translated: I will always be free from the concepts of self and other, and will not abide in permanence.

original: bla med byang chub mchog tu dus kun bskyed //
analyzed: bla med byang chub mchog tu dus kun bskyed //
translated: And may I always arouse the supreme mind of bodhichitta.

original: phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs //üîΩkhyod la bdag gi sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang // dge ba chos sdud sems can don byed pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs // khyod la bdag gi sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang // dge ba chos sdud sems can don byed pa'i //
translated: O Buddhas and Bodhisattvas dwelling in the ten directions, think of me!

original: bslab gsum deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: bslab gsum deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
translated: From this day forth, I take my refuge in the Three Trainings:üîΩIn the discipline of the Pratimoksha, in the Vinaya,üîΩIn the accumulation of virtue, and in the service of beings.

original: bsod nams stobs 'dis chos gnas thams cad la //
analyzed: bsod nams stobs 'dis chos gnas thams cad la //
translated: By the power of this merit, may all the teachings of the Dharma

original: bla med mchod sprin 'byung zhing bgyi bgyis shog / sems can rnams kyang sgrib tshogs kun byang nas //
analyzed: bla med mchod sprin 'byung zhing bgyi bgyis shog / sems can rnams kyang sgrib tshogs kun byang nas //
translated: Be honored with the best of offerings. May all beings be freed from every obscuration.üîΩMay they perfect the accumulations of virtue and become omniscient.

original: yon tan tshogs rdzogs kun mkhyen mchog gyur cig / bdag kyang dus kun blo rnams snying rje ldan //
analyzed: yon tan tshogs rdzogs kun mkhyen mchog gyur cig / bdag kyang dus kun blo rnams snying rje ldan //
translated: May I always be endowed with wisdom and compassion.

original: ting 'dzin shes rab gzungs sgo mchog thob nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin shes rab gzungs sgo mchog thob nas //
translated: May I attain the supreme door of concentration, of wisdom, and of dharani.

original: 'gro kun bder 'gyur spyod mchog rnams byed cing //
analyzed: 'gro kun bder 'gyur spyod mchog rnams byed cing //
translated: May I be able to bring about the happiness of all beings and to practice the most perfect conduct.üîΩMay I realize the nature of phenomena just as it is.

original: chos rnams mtshan nyid ji bzhin rtogs gyur cig / bsdu ba bzhis bsdus pha rol phyin rdzogs shing //
analyzed: chos rnams mtshan nyid ji bzhin rtogs gyur cig / bsdu ba bzhis bsdus pha rol phyin rdzogs shing //
translated: May I gather beings through the four means of attraction and perfect the paramitas.

original: mos spyod la sogs sa rnams kun sbyangs nas //üîΩnyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib tshogs @317a * //
analyzed: mos spyod la sogs sa rnams kun sbyangs nas // nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib tshogs @317a * //
translated: Having purified all the stages, such as the stage of practice,

original: rnams spangs te //
analyzed: rnams spangs te //
translated: And having abandoned the masses of afflictive and knowledge obscurations,

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur //
translated: May I complete the accumulations of merit and wisdom and become a buddha.üîΩMay I pacify the afflictive suffering of all beings

original: bdag ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran tsam gyis //üîΩ'gro kun nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi byed shog / lus sems ngag rnams spyod yul cir 'jug pa //
analyzed: bdag ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran tsam gyis // 'gro kun nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi byed shog / lus sems ngag rnams spyod yul cir 'jug pa //
translated: Through merely seeing, hearing, touching, or remembering me.üîΩMay whatever I do with my body, speech, and mind

original: srog chags rnams la bde ba'i rgyur gyur cig / dus kun bdag gis lus ngag yid kun nas //
analyzed: srog chags rnams la bde ba'i rgyur gyur cig / dus kun bdag gis lus ngag yid kun nas //
translated: Become a cause of happiness for all living beings.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad ci bsags pa //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad ci bsags pa //
translated: Whatever roots of virtue I have accumulatedüîΩThrough my body, speech, and mind at all times,

original: dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin //
translated: Just as they have been dedicated by the victors of the three times,

original: thams cad bla med byang chub myur 'grub bsngo //
analyzed: thams cad bla med byang chub myur 'grub bsngo //
translated: I dedicate them all for the swift attainment of unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: byang chub 'byung ba'i smon lam slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The Aspiration for the Arising of Enlightenment by ƒÄrya NƒÅgƒÅrjuna is complete.
